name: Youth Leadership Workshop
description: Empowering young leaders with spiritual principles and practical leadership skills. Team building, communication, and mentorship.

location: The Heron Hotel, Jakaya Kikwete Road, Nairobi
name: Women Family Breakfast Meeting 2025
description: WOFAB 2025: Women Family Breakfast Meeting. Chief Guest: Hon. Hanna Wendot Cheptumo (Cabinet Secretary for Gender, Culture and Children Services). Key Note Speaker: Dr Gilda Odera (President, Federation of Kenya Employees). Panelists: Lady Justice Caroline Kendagor, Josephine Kirumba, Rebecca Gitau, Mrs. Anne Mbugua. Theme: 'Actions for Peace: Our Ambition for PEACEFUL Families'. Date: 16th September 2025, 8AM-11AM, The Heron Hotel, Nairobi.

name: Annual Family Peace Conference 2025
description: Join us for our annual conference focusing on building stronger God-centered families and communities. Keynote speakers, workshops, youth activities, and more.
